content:
That's completely understandable! Organizing photos can be a daunting task, but it's worth it in the end.

Using auto mode is a great way to start, and it's awesome that you got great shots despite not fiddling with settings. Next time, you can experiment with different modes and settings to see what works best for you. Who knows, you might discover a new favorite feature or technique!

Google Photos' editing features are pretty user-friendly, and they can make a big difference in enhancing your photos. The automatic video creation feature is a lot of fun, and it's a great way to relive your music festival experience. You can even add music to the video to make it more engaging.

When you get a chance, try creating a video with Google Photos. It's as simple as selecting the photos and videos you want to include, choosing a theme or music, and letting Google Photos do the rest. You can even share the video with friends and family or post it on social media.

Remember, the most important thing is to have fun and enjoy the process of capturing and reliving your memories!
